alert.note: Alert for Bennington; Eastern Windham; Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 24 at 3:26PM EST until February 25 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 10 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 12 inches with 12 to 18 inches over the southern Greens. * WHERE...The western and southern Adirondacks, Lake George Saratoga region, and southern Vermont. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 10 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute and may impact the evening commute Friday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Maximum snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour are expected in the morning prior to daybreak and may continue into the early afternoon.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
